CONJUGATES: more helpful | most helpful | helpfully (adv) | helpfulness (n)
ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English help (noun) + -ful (suffix meaning 'full of, tending to'). First recorded use in the sense of 'furnishing help' dates to the late 16th century.

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Providing assistance or aid; useful in achieving a goal.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 提供帮助或援助的；有用的；有益的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The staff member was very helpful and showed me exactly where the product was located.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 那位工作人员非常乐于助人，并准确地指给我产品的位置。
